entry.title: [GRA3][Network] - Network equipment
entry.content:
Jul 24, 10:58 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/07/2022 10:38 UTC
End Time : 24/07/2022 10:48 UTC
Service impact : This morning we had a failure on some components of a network equipment.
This caused a down time of about 10 minutes. After replacing the defective components and rebooting, network is up again.
Root cause : Incident caused by a fault in the cooling system.
